reference: The European Commission organized these surveys, which have been held approximately annually since 1970. The usual sampling method was nationwide stratified quota samples of individuals older than 14. Summing across years, approximately 35,000 individuals were interviewed from each of Belgium, Britain, Denmark, France, Germany, Southern Ireland, Italy, and The Netherlands. Slightly smaller samples are available from Northern Ireland, Portugal and Spain.
